oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Brooks Museum Exhibit Room
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: “Art Exhibit Room, Brooks Memorial Art Gallery, Memphis Park Commission, Memphis, Tenn.” Color image.

“Mrs. A. J. Godfrey -- Sweet Home -- Ark. -- Box 15 -- Dear Mama, -- How are you -- today? Well I -- guess you’d like -- to see this -- wouldn’t you? -- I did. And is -- it pretty. Well -- Goodbye. Grandmas -- address is Union -- isn’t it? -- [torn]Bye -- Bettie Lou -- Save this card for [torn]”
